assists.description: The number of assists by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

creeps.description: The number of creeps killed by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

deaths.description: The number of deaths by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

denies.description: The number of denies by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

enemy_assists.description: The number of assists by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_creeps.description: The number of creeps killed by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_deaths.description: The number of deaths by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_denies.description: The number of denies by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_hero_id.description: The ID of the opposing hero. See more: <https://assets.deadlock-api.com/v2/heroes>

enemy_kills.description: The number of kills by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_last_hits.description: The number of last hits by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_networth.description: The net worth of `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

enemy_obj_damage.description: The amount of objective damage dealt by `enemy_hero_id` when facing `hero_id`.

hero_id.description: The ID of the hero. See more: <https://assets.deadlock-api.com/v2/heroes>

kills.description: The number of kills by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

last_hits.description: The number of last hits by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

matches_played.description: The total number of matches played between `hero_id` and `enemy_hero_id` that meet the filter criteria.

networth.description: The net worth of `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

obj_damage.description: The amount of objective damage dealt by `hero_id` when facing `enemy_hero_id`.

wins.description: The number of times `hero_id` won the match when facing `enemy_hero_id`.
